infos.value: Lu'Cia, commander of Rundall's third division, «Calorum».
Well, that certainly makes the bartering easier.
Turn them over. All of them.
Those Crystals were gathered by our followers as proof of their faith.
They do not belong with the likes of—
I would have preferred to play with him a little bit...
But alas, King Jayden has graced us with his company on this occasion, and there is simply no time.
Besides, you lot need a few more decades under your belt before you're ready for Lady Lu'Cia's playtime!
Lady Lu'Cia! Let's finish them all, here and now.
